content: फु(फू)त् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} An onomatopoetic word generally used in composition with कृ. and imitative of the sound made by blowing into liquids &c.; sometimes it expresses disregard or contempt; (फु फू) त्कृ {@--1@} to blow into (a liquid); बालः पायसदग्धो दध्यपि फूत्कृत्य भक्षयति <ls>H. 4. 103.</ls> {@--2@} To scream aloud, cry, shriek.
